channel.title: Windows Server on Rob Sewell (aka SQL DBA With A Beard)

item.title: Populating My DBA Database for Power Bi with PowerShell - Server Info
item.description: Following my last post about using Power Bi with my DBA Database I have been asked if I would share the PowerShell scripts which I use to populate my database. They are the secondary part to my DBADatabase which I also use to automate the installation and upgrade of all of my DBA scripts as I started to blog about in this post Installing and upgrading default scripts automation - part one - Introduction which is a series I will continue later.
